data.content: The document is the first part of a two-book volume that provides specifications for a design project. It includes the basis of design, detailing different design aspects and parameters that will be used in the project. The document also contains a text describing the work undertaken, notes on special situations or conditions, and recommendations for foundation design and construction.

The term "space program" in this context refers to the planning and arrangement of spaces in a building or complex to suit specific needs or functions. For example, it can involve designing villas to accommodate high-ranking employees and their families, or arranging large lecture halls for professional continuing education programs. The program components reflect the needs and interests of the users.
